metadata.title: CVE-2023-50868 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Preparing an NSEC3 closest encloser proof can exhaust CPU resources

criterions.comment: bind9: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
unbound: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
dnsmasq: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
pdns-recursor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
knot-resolver: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
